Inspirational

  • The importance of stupidity in scientific research
  • Cargo Cult Science – Richard Feynman
  • The pleasure of finding things out – Richard Feynman

Publication and presentation

  • LaTeX

Technical

For RF Engineers

  • Microwave101: An encyclopedic collection of microwave engineering knowledge with no lack of a sense of humor.
  • The Signal Path Blog: Review, teardown, and repair of electronic instrument, with a focus on high frequency gears. Be sure to subscribe to the Youtue channel also.
  • Matjaz S53MZ’s Ham Radio Site
  • Scotty Spectrum Analyzer: Build your own spectrum analyzer for under $1,000. Mailinglist

For General Electronics Hobbyists

  • Circuit Playground: A set of videos from Adafruit Industries on very basic concepts in electronics
  • Jeremy Blum’s video tutorials on Arduino
  • EEVblog: Video blog about everything electronics from Dave Jones.
  • Talking Electronics: A wealth of knowledge and all kinds of electronic project kits.

Conferences and Journals Archives

  • IEEE International Microwave Symposium
  • IEEE Transactions on Microwave Theory and Techniques
  • IEEE Microwave Magazine
  • IEEE Wireless and Microwave Component Letters
  • IEEE/ASME Journal of Microelectromechanical Systems
  • IEEE Journal on Solid State Circuits
